newsitem.title: USA: ALUMINUM--US physical market defies futures tumble.
newsitem.headline: ALUMINUM--US physical market defies futures tumble.

text.p: The tumble in aluminum futures prices to 28-month lows on the London Metal Exchange Monday comes in stark contrast to the relatively healthy physical demand in the United States.
"Business is pretty darn good in the States - the problem is business is not good in Europe and that's what's keeping the lid on prices," said analyst James Southwood of Commodity Metals Management.
LME aluminum stocks have edged toward a million tonnes.
